headline: CenterPoint Energy (CNP): Is the Stock’s Robust Run Still Leaving Room for Upside?
summary: CenterPoint Energy (CNP) has quietly delivered a steady performance over the past year, posting gains that outpaced the broader utility sector. Investors who are watching for consistent dividend payers might find recent market action worth a closer look. See our latest analysis for CenterPoint Energy. After a stretch of solid performance, CenterPoint Energy’s share price currently sits at $39.60, with momentum building over the year as reflected by a sharp 25.75% year-to-date share price...
